title: The restitution of King Nabuchadnezzer Dan. 4. Verses. 31. 32. 33. 34. By Henrie Smith.
author: Smith, Henry, 1550?-1591.
publisher: Printed by Thomas Scarlet [and are to be sold by William Wright],
notes: Running title reads: The restitution of Nabuchadnezzer.
Reprinted in various collections of the sermons of Henry Smith.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
